nodes.text: The D'Aelgoth sector was a sector where Grand Admiral Rae Sloane of the Galactic Empire directed assets in 5 ABY. The Yomo Council, a faction that had formerly been part of the Empire, refused to follow Sloane's order, and Colonel Soran Keize of the Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing listed it among a number of "treasonous actions" by the Yomo Council before his forces proceeded to destroy their forces at the planet Fedovoi End.

The D'Aelgoth sector was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed. In Star Wars Legends, the sector was first mentioned in the 1997 novel The Hutt Gambit, written by A. C. Crispin.
